events.name: Bible Study
events.description: Join us every Monday for Bible Study! This Monday we will continue our discussion about the following Sunday's Gospel reading.

events.name: Inquiry
events.description: Inquiry is a place for anyone from any background to come and ask questions about the Catholic faith, Catholic view on worldly topics, and how to communicate beliefs. It is a circle of conversation to help each other learn and be able to articulate your beliefs with trained Catechists to assist with accuracy in theology. Its a great way to learn more, and invite your friends to do the same.

events.name: Men's Small Group
events.description: Mens small group is a two hour period each week where the men of NCM come together to share in community, food, and prayer. During this time we reflect on the gospel for the week and discuss the topics that are on the hearts and minds of young men of faith today.

events.name: Women's Small Group
events.description: Women's Small Group is a weekly activity where the ladies in NCM meet to have a ladies talk. We have discussions about several topics related to our faith and us. And there's always deserts!

events.name: Mass on Campus
events.description: This Friday, September 6, we will be celebrating mass on campus!

events.name: Sunday Dinner
events.description: Comets, you made it through the week! Treat yourself to free food and fellowship.
